channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache -- Apache OFBiz
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache -- Apache OFBiz

item.title: CVE-2020-1943|2024-08-04T06:53:59.927Z -- apache -- apache%20ofbiz
item.description: Data sent with contentId to /control/stream is not sanitized, allowing XSS attacks in Apache OFBiz 16.11.01 to 16.11.07.

item.title: CVE-2019-0235|2024-08-04T17:44:15.925Z -- apache -- apache%20ofbiz
item.description: Apache OFBiz 17.12.01 is vulnerable to some CSRF attacks.
